pageContext.claim: “It will be a rough night for Donald Trump because the women won't come out. We got 52%, right? Fifty-two, right? And I'm running against a woman. You know, that's not that easy.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is citing the exit-poll results only for white women, in which he got 52 percent. But for all women, exits polls show he received only 41 percent. Clinton received the votes of 54 percent of all women.
